name: VILLAGE OF OAK LAWN, ILLINOIS
sampleDescriptions: Seeking support for relocation and modernization of Oak Lawn Post Office.
Support for AFG grant programs toward mass casualty training, 911 dispatch, and bleed kits.
Support for tollway spur project and link to CAL-SAG trail.
Seeking to maintain tax free municipal bonds.  Support for Market Place Fairness Act.

Seeking federal funding in the Fiscal Year 2018 and 2019 Transportation and Housing and Urban Development Appropriations Bills for road improvement and trail projects,and for the Community Development
